consent.title: Study Consent
content: Thank you for your interest in participating in our research study.
This study aims to collect user data on beliefs about probability distributions.
Your participation is voluntary and you can withdraw at any time.
All data collected will be kept confidential and used only for research purposes.
The study will take approximately 5 minutes to complete.
By clicking 'I Consent', you agree to participate in this study.

sections.title: Understanding the Interface
sections.content: You will be presented with a series of scenarios and questions. Each scenario may have multiple questions that you need to answer.

sections.title: Navigation
sections.content: Use the navigation buttons at the bottom to move between scenarios. You can review and change your answers before submitting.

sections.title: Submitting Responses
sections.content: After answering all scenarios, a green button will appear to submit your responses. Once completed, you will be redirected to a quick demographic survey, after which your participation in the study will be complete.

demographic.title: Demographic Information
demographic.description: Please help us by providing some demographic information. This will help us better understand our study results.
